{"id":1047120854,"lang":"golang","lang_name":"Go","time":"6 days, 7 hours","timestamp":1694493018,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"17 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1047120854/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"6.2 MB","code":"func pivotIndex(nums []int) int {\n    var l, r int\n    for _, v := range nums {\n        r += v\n    }\n\n    for i, v := range nums {\n        if i == 0 {\n            r -= v\n            if r == l {\n                return i\n            }\n            continue\n        }\n        r -= v\n        l += nums[i - 1]\n        if r == l {\n            return i\n        }\n    }\n    return -1\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
